div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
CodeDisplay
LG41762-2SocialDeterminantsOfHealth
Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/servicerequest-category

description.value: A set of SNOMED CT and LOINC concepts to classify a requested service
